arts.ttl: What a steward did to Jhon Duran as Emi Martinez gets cheeky in Villa win
arts.sum: Jacob Ramsey scored just over 10 minutes later, before Ollie Watkins and Jhon Duran both saw goals ruled out by VAR either side of the break, but Amadou Onana ensured Villa would be leaving with a strong boost to the goal difference as well as three important points. "I wanted to enjoy the game and play as I can play, give the best I can give the team, to give my whole experience from previous campaigns in the Champions League," Tielemans told UEFA after full-time.

arts.ttl: John Townley's Aston Villa player ratings after 3-0 win at Young Boys as duo run Champions League show - John Townley
arts.sum: VAR overturned an Ollie Watkins goal, claiming the ball hit his hand, before Jhon Duran also saw his strike chalked off in the second half for a handball from Amadou Onana, who crashed in Villa's third of the night in the 86th minute. A defensive calamity from Young Boys allowed Villa to go two goals ahead as their goalkeeper appeared to foul Watkins before Ramsey finished from close range.

arts.ttl: Unai Emery on Jhon Duran controversy after disallowed Aston Villa goal
arts.sum: Unai Emery insists it is "not fair" to focus on Jhon Duran's decision to celebrate his goal - which was later chalked off by VAR - in front of the Young Boys fans after Aston Villa's 3-0 win at the Wankdorf Stadium. After the match, Emery was asked a number of questions about Duran's celebration, but the Villa boss wanted to focus on the football instead.

arts.ttl: TalkSPORT pundit appears to take sly dig at Ange Postecoglou whilst watching Aston Villa
Young Boys 0-3 Aston Villa: Unai Emery praises side after emphatic Champions League win
arts.sum: Aston Villa head coach Unai Emery was full of praise for his side after they emphatically defeated Young Boys in the Champions League on Tuesday night.

arts.sum: Youri Tielemans, Jacob Ramsey and Amadou Onana struck for the Premier League side
